pages.title: Dwarven Anvil
pages.text: Dwarves don't easily make friends with outsiders, but if you are one of the few who has earned the gratitude of a dwarf, you have a friend for life.

pages.title: Summoning Contract
pages.text: A summoning contract can be obtained by trading with dwarves (up to level 3). By shift-right clicking the dwarven anvil with the summoning scroll, you will bind a dwarf to that anvil.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The summoned dwarf will craft for you when you place the correct recipe in the anvil. So make sure there is a dwarf bound to the anvil.

pages.title: Mana
pages.text: You can replenish the mana of the anvil, by placing fey dust as fuel in the buttom-left slot of the anvil. Most special recipes require mana.

pages.title: Providing for a Dwarf
pages.text: The summoned dwarf will have different trades then those found in caves or at the blacksmith. They will require a daily meal in exchange for ore. If you provide the dwarf with enough meals he will offer you his knowledge in the form of schematics

pages.title: Schematics
pages.text: Most recipes for the anvil will require schematics. You can place the schematics in the top-left slot of the anvil. Schematics are obtained by trading with a summoned dwarf.

So to craft with the dwarven anvil make sure you have enough mana, a dwarf should be bound to the anvil, and you require the correct schematics. Ones all items are placed the dwarf will start crafting for you!
